Reviews.Title: “If you like modern, Vegas style hotel in Mexico!”

Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights modern white window faced ocean balcony rooftop wonderful lounging 360 views dipping pool service evening bonus noisy street bars front coco bongo wouldnt recommend families theres privacy bathroomshower beds comfortable slept mexico definitely couple nights heart action near 5th avenue

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous design and service in the heart of Playa!”

Reviews.Content: booked hotel tripadvisor ratings feb 11th found fashion walking 12th curious looked del rio greeted offered decorated minimally art laidout bathroom roof tour pool friendliness enthusiasm hotel infectious decided change hotels soon staying fashion 6 nights loved staff super helpful friendly standard ocean view cost hotel left included breakfast bed comfortable linens lots pillows doubleheaded shower 2 marble sinks bathroom lighting recessed dimmers typical hacienda look street coco bongo night clubs worried loud insulated wasnt location passes beach club sensi included free chairs 10 bill short walk hotel try ceviche ive playa hotel breakfast included service slow typical playa doubt stay highly recommend hotel wish thank staff helped vacation wonderful
